CustomField.description: BODEV-632: Formula text field to show the summary of Opp stats with icons. Icons stored in Static Resources.
CustomField.formula:
/* Opportunity Summary consists of 3 parts 1. Lock icon (when the Opp is locked for pending approval) 2. Opp type 3. Won/Lost (when the Opp is closed) */
IF( ISPICKVAL(Approval_Status__c, "Pending") || ISPICKVAL(DoA_Approval_Status__c, "Pending"), IMAGE('/resource/Icon_Lock', "Locked", 25,25) & " ", "" )
&
IMAGE( '/resource/Icon_' & CASE(TEXT(Type), "New Business-Enterprise Cloud", "New_Business", "New Business - Expansion Portal", "New_Business", "Existing Business-Renewal", "Renewal", "Existing Business-Upsell", "Upsell", "Existing Business - Internal Transfer", "Transfer", "Existing Business - Platform Transfer", "Transfer", "Existing Business-Professional Services", "Professional_Service", "Referral", "Referral", "" ), "Opp Type", 25, 110 )
&
IF( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), " " & IMAGE('/resource/Icon_Won', "Won", 25, 38), "" ) & IF( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost"), " " & IMAGE('/resource/Icon_Lost', "Lost", 30, 45), "" )
CustomField.label: Opportunity Summary
